name: Hellspawn (Webil, polopenzo, Sleepwalk Studios, Brexelgames)
description:
First game we have ever made, made for My First Game Jam: Summer 2017.

Controls:

A  -move left

D - move right

Left Click - shoot projectile

Space - Jump

The Road :

Developing this game was a very rocky road and its future development is still in question. If the community thinks it has potential and if some support is given it shall be continued and the final product will be released. I  Hope you'll enjoy the prototype tho.

Feedback and support is always welcome.

Story:

You goal is to follow your corrupted father into the abyss where he awaits you. Before that you must defeat his Henchman. Kill his henchman and over take his throne.

Credits:

Many thanks to Fandemic (Scripter),polopenzo(Scripter) and BrexelGames (Art) it was a pleasure.
